description.en:
# Class Viewer

A script to view Objective-C class of JSBox, such as `BaseHintView` and so on. It helps to find its Instance Methods, Class Methods, Properties and more.

## Notes
- Correct class name is required.
- Case sensitive.

## Author
description.zh:
# Class Viewer

用于查看 JSBox 内 Objective-C 类，如 `BaseHintView` 等。此脚本可帮助寻找该类的实例方法、类方法、属性等。

## 说明
- 需要输入准确的类名；
- 输入区分大小写。

## 作者

description.en:
# Font Family

A script to view build-in font families of iOS. Tap a cell to change the text you want and swipe left to copy the font family name.

## Notes
- Build-in font families only.

## Author
description.zh:
# Font Family

用于查看 iOS 内置的字体集。点击任意一行输入想要显示的内容，左滑复制字体名称。

## 说明
- 仅内置字体集可查。

## 作者

description.en:
# iCon Picker

A script to pick the icon of JSBox and copy its name. It helps to find and copy icon name for UI coding.

## Notes
- JSBox build-in icons only.

## Author
description.zh:
# iCon Picker

用于选择 JSBox 图标并复制其名称。此脚本可帮助查看并复制图标名称从而用于 UI 编写。

## 说明
- 仅显示 JSBox 内置图标。

## 作者

description.en:
# JSBox Share Link

A script to generate official share link of `xteko.com/redir` from within JSBox scripts. It helps to encode and combine parameters of the URL.

## Notes
- Default configuration will be got from the script's setting.
- For a simple script, all parameters can be configured.
- For a package, parameters other than `Name` and `URL` will not be configured, you should set these parameters from `config.json`.

## Author
description.zh:
# JSBox Share Link

用于从 JSBox 脚本生成 `xteko.com/redir` 官方分享链接。此脚本可帮助编码并组合 URL 参数。

## 说明
- 初始参数配置将从原脚本设置获取；
- 对于单文件脚本，所有参数均可配置；
- 对于安装包格式脚本，除了 `名称` 和 `URL` 以外的参数均不可配置，请从 `config.json` 配置这些参数。

## 作者

description.en:
# QR Decoder

A script to decode QR Code from share extension or main app. It helps to decode a QR Code without saving it from apps like Twitter.

## Notes
- Simply share a QR Code image and run as this script.
- Or you can just run from main app to select a QR Code image.

## Author
description.zh:
# QR Decoder

用于通过分享或主应用运行以解析二维码图片。此脚本用于 Twitter 等应用内免保存解析二维码十分有效。

## 说明
- 直接把二维码图片通过分享以此脚本运行；
- 或从主应用运行并选择相册内的二维码图片。

## 作者

description.en:
# IPA Installer

A script to install signed ipa from share extension or main app. It helps to install backup ipas downloaded from App Store.

## Notes
- Signed ipa only, mostly they come from iTunes.
- JSBox has no permission to run in background, so **don't leave JSBox** if large ipa is being installed.

## Author
description.zh:
# IPA Installer

用于通过分享或主应用运行直接安装已签名的 ipa。此脚本可帮助安装从 App Store 下载的备份 ipa。

## 说明
- 仅已签名的 ipa 文件；
- 由于 JSBox 没有后台运行的权限，安装大文件时**请勿离开 JSBox 应用**。

## 作者

description.en:
# Image Search

A script to search by picture. It helps to access search engine qucikly from share extension or main app.

## Notes
- Support Google, Baidu and Sougou picture searching engines.

## Author
description.zh:
# Image Search

用于通过分享或主应用运行上传图片进行图片搜索。

## 说明
- 支持谷歌、百度和搜狗以图搜图引擎。

## 作者
